fields.headline: The measure
fields.bodyText: Going up Tunics The dress of the season: ask for Chloé, settle for Topshop and re-enact Rosemary's Baby. Minus, um, the devil bit, of course Manolo Blahnik candles Not as good as the shoes, admittedly, but, hey, our label love throbs hard Eating in the theatre interval The only solution to that pesky too early/too late dilemma - and Anna Wintour does it! Anna's tip (probably): keep the meal bijou Calvin Klein Suddenly we're interested again. Proof that Moss Power knows no bounds T-shirt lengths Finally they're long enough! No more yanking them down - thank you, Topshop Louise Welsh Her upcoming book is fab. Three words: Reserve. Amazon. Now Musicals Dirty Dancing! Wicked! Spamalot! Our sense of camp is getting fully unleashed this autumn! White and grey Monochrome, for summer! You know it makes sense Going down Bag names Oh for the days when a bag was just a bag and wasn't named after your gran: Mabel, Ellie, Louise, etc Jeans names See above, except replace gran with dog: Baxter, Harlan, etc Tedious ugly celebrity photos We're sick of this lazy magazine filler technique Wedge toe The medical complaint suffered by devoted wedge wearers when the big toe gives out under the strain Denim miniskirts Not really working with this season's ladylike look
